title: Motion in the plane with exp and trig functions part - a

content.description: At time t, 0 ≤ t ≤ 2π , the position of a particle moving along a path in the xy-plane is given by the parametric equations x=et sin t and y=et cos t
content.question: Find the slope of the path of the particle at time t=π / 2

frqParts.text: Find the slope of the path of the particle at time t=π / 2

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

topic.text: 9.4: (BC ONLY) Defining and Differentiating Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
